title: Graduate Engineering Programme – Software Enginering
description: Job Description Summary For more than 40 years GE Power Conversion & Storage has designed and built control and automation solutions across a broad number of segments, notably; Marine (Navy, Offshore, Merchant), Industrial process control (Mining, metals etc) and Oil & gas. These solutions range from complex Marine vessel control systems to power management systems with 100’s of intelligent devices and sensors connected. To create the above bespoke systems, we have developed a range of innovati…

title: Junior Backend Web Developer
description: Varied web tool development in supportive environment This successful and growing company are looking for bright web developers to work on a suite of web tools written with a variety of languages and frameworks. These tools are integral to the value of the products and services that have made this company such a success. These are very much a set of tools which are built with web technologies and languages rather than regular web development. This company is looking for bright junior engineers …
